login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Choose your account to start your shift

successMessage: Your password has been updated. You can now log in with your new credentials.
forgetPasswordSubtitle: Your PIN is managed by your manager
forgetPasswordMessage: Your manager will reset your PIN for you. Click the button below to send a reset request to your manager.
resetPasswordMessage: We'll send a verification code to your registered email
managerRegistrationSuccessMessage: Your manager registration has been submitted for approval.
managerRegistrationReviewMessage: We will review your information and contact you within 2-3 business days.

errorBoundary.title: Oops! Something went wrong.
errorBoundary.message: We're sorry, but an unexpected error has occurred.
errorBoundary.globalMessage: We're sorry, but a critical error has occurred. Our team has been notified. Please try refreshing the page or come back later.

selectDate.label: Select Date
staffRegistrationSuccessMessage: Your staff registration has been submitted for approval.
staffRegistrationReviewMessage: We will review your information and contact you within 2-3 business days.

validation.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
